metadata.title: The Vault — Know Yourself Deeper
metadata.description: Personality tests, voice journals, IQ assessments, and an AI that knows your data. All in one secure, private vault.

hero.title: Finally understand who you really are
hero.description: Personality tests, voice journals, IQ assessments, and an AI that knows your data. All in one secure, private vault.
hero.disclaimer: No credit card required. Takes under 10 minutes.

features.title: One place for your entire inner world
features.description: Tests, journals, AI chat, and secure storage — designed to work together so you can truly understand yourself.
features.personalityTestsDesc: Big 5, Enneagram, Personality Type, and more. Scientifically grounded assessments that reveal your core personality traits.
features.aiTherapistChatDesc: An AI that reads your personality data, journals, and test results to give deeply personalized guidance.
features.secureFileVaultDesc: Upload test results, PDFs, voice notes, and images. Everything organized by category, all in one place.
features.voiceJournalsDesc: Record reflections and mood check-ins with your voice. AI transcribes and analyzes patterns over time.
features.growthTrackingDesc: Watch your personality evolve with trend charts, mood graphs, and monthly growth reports.
features.privateByDefaultDesc: Your psychological data never leaves your vault. End-to-end encryption and zero third-party sharing.

showcase.sampleQuestion: Why do I shut down during conflict?
showcase.sampleAnswer1: Based on your Big 5 profile, your high agreeableness (74%) combined with lower extraversion (45%) means you naturally prioritize harmony. Your Enneagram Type 9 results confirm a pattern of conflict avoidance rooted in a desire for inner peace.
showcase.sampleAnswer2: This is not a flaw — it is a deeply adaptive trait. The growth edge is learning to stay present in discomfort.
showcase.personalityTestsTitle: Understand others by first understanding yourself
showcase.personalityTestsDescription: In our free type descriptions you will learn what really drives, inspires, and worries different personality types, helping you build more meaningful relationships.
showcase.aiChatTitle: An AI that actually knows you
showcase.aiChatDescription: Your Vault documents are automatically used as context. Ask anything about your personality data, test results, or journal entries and get deeply personal answers.

testimonials.title: See what others have to say

pricing.title: Invest in knowing yourself
pricing.description: Start for free. Upgrade when you want deeper insights.
pricing.freeDescription: For curious explorers ready to start the journey.

finalCta.title: Curious how accurate we are about you?
finalCta.description: Take the free personality test and see your results in under 10 minutes. No sign-up required to start.

footer.tagline: Know yourself deeper. AI-powered personality insights and secure data storage.

landing.storeNote: Also available: One-off deep-dive analyses in The Store

mirror.description: Here is your personality mirror for today.
mirror.personalitySnapshotDescription: Your five core traits from your latest Big 5 test. Take the test in the Store to fill this in.

dailyBrief.title: Daily Brief
dailyBrief.emptyState: Upload some data and start journaling to get your personalized daily brief.

personality.opennessDesc: Curious, creative, open to new experiences
personality.extraversionDesc: Balanced between social and solitary energy

constellation.title: Big 5 Personality
constellation.emptyState: Take the Big 5 test in the Store to see your radar chart here.
constellation.description: Your five traits at a glance — same data as your Personality Snapshot, shown as a chart.

trends.title: Growth Trends
trends.description: See how your Big 5 traits change over time. Take the Big 5 test every few months to build this chart.
trends.emptyState: Take the Big 5 test in the Store. Retake it in a few months to see how your traits evolve.
trends.oneSnapshot: Take the Big 5 test again in a few months to see how your traits change over time.
trends.needMore: Need at least 2 Big 5 test results to show trends. Retake the test later to build your history.

journal.title: Mood & Journal
journal.howFeeling: How are you feeling right now?
journal.noEntries: No entries yet. Tap a mood or write your first journal entry!

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.description: Your self-discovery activity over the last 90 days

moodTimeline.title: Mood Over Time
moodTimeline.description: How you've been feeling across journal entries
moodTimeline.emptyState: Start logging your mood with journal entries to see your emotional patterns over time.

growth.title: Growth Momentum
growth.description: How consistently you're showing up for self-discovery
growth.motivationStart: Start your journey today — even a single journal entry or chat counts toward your streak!
growth.motivationKeepGoing: You're building a habit! Keep showing up each day to grow your streak.
growth.motivationGreat: Great consistency! You're making self-discovery a real part of your routine.
growth.motivationAmazing: Incredible dedication! Your commitment to self-understanding is truly inspiring.

vault.title: The Vault
vault.description: Upload and manage your psychological data
vault.assessmentProgress: You have completed {count} out of {total} available assessments. Take another test to unlock deeper self-knowledge.

dropZone.orClickToBrowse: or click to browse (PDF, Text, Audio, Images)

documentDetail.noExtractedText: No extracted text available for this document.

savedProfiles.title: Saved Profiles
savedProfiles.empty: No saved profiles yet. Save other people's personality types here for quick reference (coming soon).

recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
recentActivity.subtitle: Your latest actions in The Vault
recentActivity.empty: No activity yet. Complete an assessment to see it here.

collections.description: Grouped views of your assessment results (e.g. Core Personality, Wellness).

chat.shieldEnabledToast: Privacy Shield enabled — conversations won't be stored
chat.shieldEnabledTitle: Privacy Shield is on — conversations are not stored
chat.shieldDisabledTitle: Privacy Shield is off — conversations are stored

input.contextHint: Your Vault documents are automatically used as context

thread.emptyDescription: I have access to everything in your Vault. Ask me anything about your personality data, test results, or journal entries.

activeContext.title: Active Context
activeContext.referencing: The AI is referencing these sources
activeContext.addDocuments: Add documents to give the AI context about you
activeContext.uploadHint: Upload personality tests, journal entries, or other data in the Vault, then attach them here so the AI can reference them.

store.title: Store
store.description: Discover assessments to unlock deeper self-knowledge

bundle.title: Premium Assessment Bundle
bundle.description: Get all 12 premium tests for one price. Includes Big 5 Deep Dive, IQ Pro, Career Compass, and 9 more assessments.

store.noAssessmentsHint: Try a different search term or category.
store.purchaseSuccess: Purchase successful! Your analysis will be available soon.

detail.notFoundDescription: This assessment doesn't exist or has been removed.

aiPersona.title: AI Persona
aiPersona.description: How the AI responds in Chat: balanced, direct coach, or empathetic therapist
aiPersona.balancedDesc: A thoughtful mix of insight and empathy

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the app

checkins.title: Proactive Check-ins
checkins.description: Let the AI initiate conversations on a schedule to track your growth

birthData.title: Birth data
birthData.description: Used once for astrology, numerology, Human Design, and Chinese Zodiac. Time can be "unknown" if you don't know it.
birthData.timeUnknown: I don't know my birth time

account.title: Account
account.description: Sign out or open Clerk’s account menu using the avatar. You can also use the avatar in the left sidebar to open the same menu.
account.avatarHint: Click the avatar to open the menu (sign out, profile, etc.).

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect external services to automatically sync your data into the Vault
integrations.googleDriveDesc: Sync documents from your Google Drive for RAG context
integrations.googleCalendarDesc: Import calendar events for context-aware insights
integrations.notesAppDesc: Import from Apple Notes or other note apps

journal.recordingFailed: Failed to start recording. Please check microphone permissions.

errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.unexpectedErrorRefresh: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page.
errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

test.testNotFoundDescription: This assessment does not exist or has been removed.

results.title: Your Results
results.moreInsights: + {count} more insights available in the premium report
results.moreRecommendations: + {count} more recommendations in the premium report

premium.getCompleteAnalysis: Get the complete {testTitle} analysis with actionable insights.
premium.readyToDownload: Your full {testTitle} report is ready to download.

features.dimensions: Detailed dimension breakdown with percentile rankings

bundle.title: Premium Assessment Bundle
bundle.description: Get access to all 12 assessments for one price. Unlock deeper self-knowledge across personality, intelligence, strengths, wellness, career, and astrology.
bundle.readyToUnlock: Ready to unlock your full potential?
bundle.onePaymentLifetime: One payment, lifetime access to all 12 premium assessments.
